about_the_game:
✨ WISHLIST NOW & JOIN THE ADVENTURE!

⛩️ MOCHI NEED YOU! WILL YOU SAVE… OR DESTROY THEM ALL?

 The Dread Fog spreads, twisting the land and corrupting the once-sacred Kami. Cursed Shikigami enslave the Mochi, turning them into relentless foes.

 You are their last hope. Lead the Mochi warriors, free the Kami, and reclaim a world drowning in corruption.

 When the time comes, will you save the lost… or erase them forever?

⚔️ MASTER TIMING-BASED COMBAT

Mochi Conquest blends turn-based battle with real-time precision. Every action matters.

  • Push back enemy turns to disrupt their flow.

  • Cancel attacks entirely with the perfect strike.

  • Position your forces wisely: timing and strategy decide victory!

🌸 EXPLORE A LIVING WORLD UNDER THE DREAD FOG

 The adventure map is a turn-based strategy world with hexagonal tiles, spanning various diverse regions, from lush forests to sacred shrines and forgotten lands, all shaped by seasons, time, and weather.

  • Explore multiple maps, each with unique landscapes, dangers, and opportunities.

  • Capture and visit ancient shrines to manage squads, access shops, and unlock powerful benefits.

  • Meet wandering Kami: some will test you, others will reward you, but all hold secrets.

  • Unravel hidden lore, make critical choices, and shape the course of your journey.

But when night falls, the Dread Fog expands, unleashing deadlier threats, unexpected events, and dire consequences.

 Will you brave the unknown… or be swallowed by the fog?

🚩 COMMAND MULTIPLE SQUADS

 You don’t just control one party: you lead up to 6 squads of 4 Mochi each on the adventure map, letting you prepare the perfect matchups before battle.

  • Choose the right squad for each encounter, ensuring the best synergy and strategy.

  • Position squads strategically on the adventure map to control key locations.

  • Adapt your formations between battles to counter new threats.

  Every decision shapes the battlefield. Plan wisely!

👺 PURIFY THE LOST OR CONSUME THEIR POWER

 You begin with only a few Mochi, but as you defeat corrupted ones, you can purify and recruit them.

The same fate awaits Shikigami and Kami, but you must choose:

🔹 Redemption – Free their soul, restore their essence, and bring them back to the light.
🔸 Obliteration – Shatter them completely and claim their power as your own.

 Every decision reshapes your abilities, your playstyle… and the fate of the world.

Who will you save… and who will you sacrifice?

🌀 CLASS-BASED SYSTEM & LIMITLESS CUSTOMIZATION

 Each Mochi belongs to a class that defines its stats, abilities, and exclusive Class Powers, but true strength comes from the Soul Orb system.

 Soul Orbs are the key to customization: they gain XP, level up, and can be transferred between units, allowing endless build possibilities. Without an Orb, a Mochi can only perform basic attacks and class-based powers.

Equip Soul Orbs to unlock and enhance abilities:
🟠 Waza Orbs – Grant unique combat techniques; essential for expanding attack options.
🔵 Enhancement Orbs – Amplify specific Waza for greater impact.
🟢 Boost Orbs – Increase a Waza’s power or strengthen Mochi’s stats.
🔴 Trait Orbs – Provide passive effects that influence battle mechanics or adventure map interactions.

 Shape every Mochi to fit your strategy, whether in battle or beyond!

🔥 MASTER THE POWER OF THE FIVE ELEMENTS

 The world is shaped by Fire, Air, Void, Earth, and Water, but power alone isn’t enough. True mastery lies in synergy.

  • Chain elements in the right sequence to unleash exponential damage and break enemy defenses.

  • Synergize elements for devastating combos while disrupting enemies who fail to control the flow.

  • Master the sequence, dominate the battlefield.

 No Mochi has elemental strengths or weaknesses: it’s all about how you wield the elements together!

🎴 PLAY YOUR HAND IN THREEFOLD FLIP - A GAME WITHIN THE GAME

Challenge Kamis and Shikigami to Threefold Flip, a strategic card game where every match carries real stakes.

  • Win cards featuring characters you meet and lore tied to the world.

  • Lose or gain cards as you wager against powerful opponents.

  • Unlock hidden secrets that influence your journey and reveal deeper mysteries.

More than just a diversion, Threefold Flip is a battle of wits, luck, and strategy. Play smart, take risks… and maybe, you’ll flip fate in your favor!

🌓 CHOOSE YOUR PATH: SAVIOR OR EXECUTIONER?

In a world where friend and foe are one and the same, every choice has consequences.

  • Will you redeem the lost, freeing them to fight by your side?

  • Or erase them forever, taking their power for yourself?

 The Kami will bless those who restore balance, but destruction has its own rewards.

The Dread Fog is spreading.

 Will you stand against it… or become part of it?

✨ WISHLIST NOW & JOIN THE ADVENTURE!

name: Mochi Conquest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i3-3220 or AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: MOCHI NEED YOU! Will you shape their fate or watch them fall? Lead them, free the Kami from corruption, and battle twisted Mochi in this fast-paced, turn-based strategy JRPG. Explore adventure maps, master combat timing, and uncover secrets within the Dread Fog. Save… or destroy them all!
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
